options.fig.cap: Simulation of $\varepsilon_t$, where $\varepsilon_{t} = \sigma_t \times z_{t}$, with $z_t \sim i.i.d.\,\mathcal{N}(0,1)$.

options.label: NONNstat2
options.fig.cap: Example of a process that is covariance stationary but not strictly stationary. The red lines delineate the 99\% confidence interval of the standard normal distribution ($\pm 2.58$).
